title: Can Distributism Answer Game B's Questions? pt 6 Economic Actors Transgress Our Political Limits
description: Having concluded a look at The Servile State, we frame our problem in simple terms: How do we keep powerful economic actors from corrupting a political system carefully crafted to limit political power? Perhaps Jordan Peterson's description of an iterated game is a goal to aim for in our economic system. Peak Prosperity, How The Wall Street Casino Is Stealing Your Money: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d5YHCkU7vzk
